MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the L21 postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Stanley  Park, Norwood Avenue and surrounding streets. This is causing reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:00PM. Our engineers are on their way to the area and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 7:30PM on 8th December 2020.
